messages.content: Would you please provide your age?
Thank you for trusting on me to help, could you please give me your first name?
How much money would you like to invest?
Please select your risk level below:
What level of investment risk would you like to take?

valueElicitationPrompt.responseCard: {"version":1,"contentType":"application/vnd.amazonaws.card.generic","genericAttachments":[{"imageUrl":"https://i1.wp.com/bioposture.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/icon-no-risk.png?ssl=1","subTitle":"No risk at all","title":"None","buttons":[{"text":"None","value":"None"}]},{"imageUrl":"https://www.quostar.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/risk-meter.png","subTitle":"Just a bit of risk","title":"Very Low or Low","buttons":[{"text":"Low","value":"Low"},{"text":"Very Low","value":"Very Low"}]},{"imageUrl":"https://www.pmoadvisory.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/value-add-risk-icon.png","subTitle":"Let's start getting wild","title":"Medium","buttons":[{"text":"Medium","value":"Medium"}]},{"imageUrl":"http://www.pngmart.com/files/7/Risk-PNG-Transparent.png","subTitle":"I have no fear!","title":"High or Very High","buttons":[{"text":"High","value":"High"},{"text":"Very High","value":"Very High"}]}]}

messages.content: Sorry, can you please repeat that?
Sorry, I could not understand. Goodbye.
